name: Eastside Co
tagline: One of the most trusted Shopify Plus Partners
description:
Eastside Co is one of the world’s most trusted and experienced Shopify Plus Partners. Established in 2012 as a full-service digital agency, we’ve helped hundreds of aspirational brands exceed their goals thanks to our world-class ecommerce solutions.
Ethos
Excellence is at the heart of all we do. We balance scale and growth with beautiful design to help the most ambitious brands captivate customers with engaging online experiences. From start-ups to enterprise businesses: wherever a company is on their journey, we can help them achieve objectives. We blend of craftsmanship, creativity and technical knowledge to ensure we’re always pushing the boundaries of ecommerce.
From beautifully designed, intuitive Shopify stores, to data-driven marketing strategies and best-in-class applications, we help online businesses escape the ordinary and achieve ecommerce success.
Strategy
We’re a full-service, in-house digital agency. No freelancers. No outsourcing. Just a close-knit team of over 50 talented people, passionate about their work and collaborating with clients to deliver world-class results, every time. Our board-level strategic advice and consultative approach enables us to understand clients’ goals and help realise their ambitions through powerful Shopify stores, strategies and software. Together, we make ecommerce better.
Community
We hire the best people in their field, which means we have an exceptional team of over 50 forward-thinking designers, developers, project managers and marketers. Constantly encouraging new ideas and knowledge sharing, we’ve created a learning environment where everyone can be the best they can be.
